title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V2\ExplicitDecodingConfig
name: ExplicitDecodingConfig
description:
Explicitly specified decoding parameters.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v2.ExplicitDecodingConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.encoding
params.description: Required. Encoding of the audio data sent for recognition.

params.name: data.sample_rate_hertz
params.description: Sample rate in Hertz of the audio data sent for recognition. Valid values are: 8000-48000. 16000 is optimal. For best results, set the sampling rate of the audio source to 16000 Hz. If that's not possible, use the native sample rate of the audio source (instead of re-sampling). Supported for the following encodings: LINEAR16: Headerless 16-bit signed little-endian PCM samples. MULAW: Headerless 8-bit companded mulaw samples. * ALAW: Headerless 8-bit companded alaw samples.

params.name: data.audio_channel_count
params.description: Number of channels present in the audio data sent for recognition. Supported for the following encodings: LINEAR16: Headerless 16-bit signed little-endian PCM samples. MULAW: Headerless 8-bit companded mulaw samples. * ALAW: Headerless 8-bit companded alaw samples.

methods.description:
